alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 8:49AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Florence, Georgetown, southwestern Horry, southwestern Marion and central Williamsburg Counties through 945 AM EST... At 849 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pamplico to south of Trio. Movement was east at 40 to 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Yawkey South Island, Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Winyah Bay Entrance, Socastee, Andrews, Johnsonville, Hemingway, North Santee, Rhems, Pee Dee Crossroads, Oatland, Poston, Nesmith, Brittons Neck and Indiantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building until this line of storms passes through.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg
